statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM users WHERE password LIKE '%pass%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND password <> '123456';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' OR email = 'admin@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'johnsmith';
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM user_sessions WHERE session_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, s.login_time FROM users u JOIN user_sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE s.last_access_time IS NULL;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(s.session_id) AS session_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING session_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, log_message, log_date FROM users INNER JOIN user_logs ON users.user_id = user_logs.user_id;
SELECT user_id, session_token, expiration_date FROM user_sessions WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT log_message, log_date FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 2 AND log_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM user_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT session_id, login_time, session_data FROM sessions WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT role_id, COUNT(user_id) AS user_count FROM user_roles GROUP BY role_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS total_sessions FROM users JOIN sessions ON users.user_id = sessions.user_id GROUP BY username HAVING total_sessions > 5;
SELECT * FROM roles JOIN user_roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id WHERE role_name LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 5 AND login_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM user_sessions GROUP BY user_id HAVING session_count > 10 ORDER BY session_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, password FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT u.username, ur.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id;
SELECT u.username, a.creation_date FROM users u JOIN account_details a ON u.user_id = a.user_id ORDER BY a.creation_date ASC;
